00001 #include "Lgm/Lgm_MagModelInfo.h"
00002 int Lgm_B_T96MOD_MGH( Lgm_Vector *v, Lgm_Vector *B, Lgm_MagModelInfo *MagInfo ) {
00003 
00004     Lgm_Vector  B2;
00005     int         IYEAR, IDAY, IH, IM;
00006     double      UTC, X, Y, Z, Bx, By, Bz, SEC, parmod[11], amdf[11];
00007 
00008 
00009     X = v->x; Y = v->y; Z = v->z;
00010     IYEAR = MagInfo->c->UTC.Year;
00011     IDAY  = MagInfo->c->UTC.Doy;
00012     UTC    = MagInfo->c->UTC.Time;
00013     IH    = (int)UTC;
00014     IM    = (int)((UTC - (double)IH)*60.0);
00015     SEC   = (UTC - (double)IH - (double)IM/60.0)/3600.0;
00016 
00017 
00018     /* 
00019      *  These are the extra variable params for the T96MOD
00020      *  We do it this way, so we can fit them more easily.
00021      */
00022     amdf[1] = MagInfo->T96MOD_V[0]; // multiplier for B_RC
00023     amdf[2] = MagInfo->T96MOD_V[1]; // multiplier for B_Tail2
00024     amdf[3] = MagInfo->T96MOD_V[2]; // multiplier for B_Tail3
00025     amdf[4] = MagInfo->T96MOD_V[3]; // multiplier for B_Tail3_Additional
00026     amdf[5] = MagInfo->T96MOD_V[4]; // DMODIF in THIN CURRENT SHEET THICKNESS (set to zero if you dont want the extra term)
00027 
00028     parmod[1] = MagInfo->P;
00029     parmod[2] = MagInfo->Dst;
00030     parmod[3] = MagInfo->By;
00031     parmod[4] = MagInfo->Bz;
00032     parmod[5] = 0.0;
00033     parmod[6] = 0.0;
00034 
00035 
00036     lgm_field_t96mod_mgh_( &parmod[1], &amdf[1], &IYEAR, &IDAY, &IH, &IM, &SEC, &X, &Y, &Z, &Bx, &By, &Bz );
00037 
00038     Lgm_B_igrf(  v, &B2, MagInfo );
00039     B->x = Bx + B2.x;
00040     B->y = By + B2.y;
00041     B->z = Bz + B2.z;
00042 
00043     ++MagInfo->nFunc;
00044 
00045     return(1);
00046 
00047 }
